title: Old type
content:
Found some great stuff at a antique shop, that i thought you all could appreciate

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/joostmarcellis/sets/72157620499671059/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415204329/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/joostmarcellis/sets/72157620499671059/ "http://www.flickr.com/photos/joostmarcellis/sets/72157620499671059/")
author: Joostmarcellis

comments.content:
I feel I have seen a reprint of some of the Monrocq Frères plates somewhere, very juicy look to them.

Tim
These are supossed to be authentic, i like to know more about monrocq frères, so if you can tell me anything or point me in the right direction, i would apreciate it

Very Cool! You should submit the images to: [http://welovetypography.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415204329/http:/welovetypography.com/ "http://welovetypography.com/")

and tag them so others can find your antique find!

@polo  
i tried, but i not sure if it worked
